translation.ja: ブレアは３分 年上だよ

translation.en: And I'm not a hippie!
Here they come.
Hey, Cath, could you get the bathroom for me, too, please?
translation.ja: キャシー トイレ掃除を頼む

translation.en: Aye- aye, Cap'n.
Okay, we're not on a ship.
Just let her be happy, Bowser. Just let her be happy.
translation.ja: まあいい 彼女の気分を害すな

translation.en: Is this your job job? I thought you were a bounty- hunter.
Can I have a vanilla with extra gummy bears?
Wait. You. Don't knock my side- hustle, kid.
translation.ja: おい 俺の副業を バカにするな

translation.en: Trust me. You never know.
And yes, you can have extra gummy bears, that'll be an extra 75 cents.
translation.ja: トッピング増量は 75セント増しだ

translation.en: Do you sing if I tip?
No, I will not sing.
You're no fun.
- What is-- ? - Hey! What you waitin' on?
Come on.
You, uh... got the cash?
Yup.
Turn around, please.
Thank you.
All right.
- - Oh, shit.
Yeah. Go for Bowser.
No. No. No. No. Yolanda.
Don't give it to that bitch- ass, Terrance.
I'll find him.
I know.
The Men's Parlor. I know.
Because I'll find--
translation.ja: 俺が必ず… 俺が必ず… 〝高額賞金首〞

translation.en: You heard what I said, didn't you?
translation.ja: 〝高額賞金首〞 聞こえただろ？ 聞こえただろ？

translation.en: Shit.
Hey. Put that back. What are you doing? Here you go.
Count it, Sterling.
- That's great. Thank you. It's good. - All right.
translation.ja: ありがとう よし お疲れさん

translation.en: Good doing business with you.
- As the old saying goes, Bye. - Uh...
Hey, Bowser.
Yeah.
You look... manly.
Oily... Uh...
Vehicular- ly inclined.
Anyway, do you know how much it might cost us
translation.ja: とにかく トラックの修理に

translation.en: to get that fixed? Roughly?
Oily, huh? Yeah.
Well, as a man who's crashed many cars,
translation.ja: 車をたくさん 壊してきた男として言うが

translation.en: I'd say you'd probably run yourself about 5K worth of damage here.
translation.ja: 修理費は5000ドル かかるだろう

translation.en: Yeah.
Um... Do you have any more jobs?
Ah, jeez, if I had any more jobs,
if I had more jobs-- Look...
I like you girls. I do.
translation.ja: お前たちは気に入った

translation.en: You're fast as hell.
You run like a deer. It was amazing.
And you, you're a freakishly good shot.
But I've got rent to pay. I can't split my rewards on folks I can nab on my own, see?
translation.ja: だが俺には生活があるから 賞金は渡せない

translation.en: Hey, we get it.
Yeah, well, getting it is half the battle, ah?
translation.ja: 捜すまでが大変なんだ

translation.en: So, what do you want to do now? Go to the Men's Parlor?
translation.ja: 今から男性用理髪店に行く？

translation.en: That secret club of which we know the exact location?
translation.ja: 秘密のクラブだけど 場所も分かるね

translation.en: Hey, uh, what's the address over there?
The address alone won't get you very far.
- And why is that? - You need us to get in it.
translation.ja: なぜ？ 私たちと一緒なら入れる

translation.en: It-- um-- It's in this country club
translation.ja: 私たちと一緒なら入れる

translation.en: and they only cater to this specific clientele, it's--
translation.ja: カントリークラブ内で 会員は…

translation.en: - White people. - Blair.
What? It's true!
I don't think it's written in stone, but...
actually, it-- it might be.
So, unfortunately these places have some outdated policies that don't--
translation.ja: 残念ながら 時代遅れの方針が残って…

translation.en: Okay. Enough with the Black history, Reverend Al Sharpton. I get it.
translation.ja: 黒人史はいい アル･シャープトン師

translation.en: They're racist.
- Right. - Yes.
Yeah, so you can have the address for,
translation.ja: 理髪店の住所は売ってあげる

translation.en: I don't know, say... a hundred,
or you could have personal whitey escorts
translation.ja: または白人の同伴者が お連れするよ

translation.en: - for three thou-- - Five.
Five thousand dollars.
If you deliver me John Stevens, y'all will get paid.
translation.ja: ジョン･スティーヴンスを 連れてきたら払う

translation.en: John Stevens, dude.
It can't be April's dad. There's gotta be a bajillion John Stevenses.
translation.ja: エイプリルのパパではない

translation.en: Bajillion John Stevenses that belong to Men's Parlor?
April's dad is the creep on our eighth grade trip to Jekyll Island
translation.ja: 彼女のパパに８年生の時

translation.en: that said I was developing nicely.
Oh, barf. Yes.
I'd love to arrest him and watch April squirm.
translation.ja: 逮捕して娘を苦しめよう

translation.en: Are you wearing my Savage X Fenty bralette again?
translation.ja: 私のブラ つけてる？

translation.en: I hate you. You'll stink it up with your smelly boobs.
translation.ja: オッパイの匂いが移るよ

translation.en: Now's not the time.
Cool. We know John Stevens.
translation.ja: ジョン･スティーヴンスは 知り合いよ

translation.en: Say again.
Oh, yeah, we brought him in before.
What did the old boy do this time?
Solicitation and battery.
Real pillar of his community. Skipped bail last week, even.
translation.ja: 地域の黒幕で 先週 保釈中に逃亡した

translation.en: Having a meeting tonight at The Men's Parlor at 6:00.
translation.ja: 今夜６時 理髪店に来る

translation.en: My bail bondsman. My bail bondswoman...
translation.ja: 保釈保証人の男 いや女…

translation.en: My bail bondsperson got a tip.
translation.ja: 保釈保証業者の情報だ

translation.en: Dope.
Let's ride.
- Dope. Let's ride. - Hey! My car.
Well, this is some Django shit.
Hey, Trevor. Hey, Miles.
Hey, Miss Wesley.
Miss Wesley.
Hey, Miles.
Oh, uh, you guys going to be parking today?
No. He's just dropping us off.
Park down by the service entrance, download Fruit Ninja.
translation.ja: “フルーツニンジャ”して 待ってて

translation.en: We'll be back with your guy.
What the hell is a fruit ninja?
I'm really hoping you have a plan.
Not so much a plan as like a general idea...ish...ment.
translation.ja: 計画なんてものはない アイデアなら

translation.en: Care to enlighten me?
Okay, how about...
we walk into The Men's Parlor like a couple of Lara Crofts.
translation.ja: 直接 理髪店に入店する

translation.en: And then we slip some of my melatonin into Mr. Stevens' drink,
translation.ja: 彼の飲み物に睡眠薬を入れる

translation.en: like James Bond and then we grab him--
Or we can clock him in the head with this pistol?
You brought a pistol?
Hello, girls...
Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Jenson. Y'all are looking sharp.
translation.ja: ジェンソン夫妻 ステキだわ

translation.en: Thank you.
I love that nail color, Mrs. Jenson.
It's like skin color, but prettier.
Y'all are too dang sweet. Tell your mother and daddy we said hello.
translation.ja: 愛らしい子たちね ご両親によろしく

translation.en: Yes, ma'am, and see you Sunday morning bright and early.
translation.ja: では 日曜日の朝に

translation.en: Oh, you will.
Aren't they precious? I wish Frank would date one of them.
translation.ja: フランクと交際させたいわ

translation.en: I wasn't going to meet up with a bounty hunter unarmed. That's just common sense. Stranger danger.
translation.ja: 危険な仕事だから 賞金稼ぎは武装が常識よ

translation.en: He's not here. It's past six o'clock--
Hey. What are you two doing in here?
Come on, get over here.
- - Quick.
Are you two crazy?
That's The Men's Parlour.
Neither of you are mens.
Y-- Yeah, obviously.
But, I don't see a Women's Parlour here.
translation.ja: 私たちは 女性用理髪店がないことに

translation.en: So, we're here in protest. Okay?
♪ Show me what a Women's Parlour looks like ♪
translation.ja: 女性理髪店を見せてくれ

translation.en: ♪ This is what a Women's Parlour looks like! ♪
- ♪ Show me what a Women's-- ♪ -
Uh-- Uh-- We're looking for John Stevens.
translation.ja: ジョン･スティーヴンスが

translation.en: We heard he had a meeting. Know where we can find him?
If I told you, I would lose my job.
You know how weird this place is about secrets and traditions.
translation.ja: 秘密と伝統に守られた場所だ

translation.en: Hey, Miles.
Hey.
Miles, we, uh...
translation.ja: マイルス あなたの助けが…

translation.en: really...
need your help...
here. So...
All right, he's in the humidor. It's where a group of guys called The Bourbon Club meet.
translation.ja: 葉巻の保存室で バーボン･クラブは集まる

translation.en: Great. Where is it?
- It's around that corner, but-- - Okay. Thanks, Miles.
translation.ja: 角を曲がって いいわ

translation.en: Okay, we'll see you later.
Did you see that? I, like, totally seduced him.
translation.ja: 彼を完璧に誘惑したよ

translation.en: Focus! I think it's this.
There's nothing here.
Well...
thanks for nothing, Miles.
What are y'all in the mood for?
We got top shelf or... hell, we can all slum it with Beam.
translation.ja: そうだな ジム･ビームにするか

translation.en: Find that single barrel we like so much from Pigeon Forge. Mm.
translation.ja: ピジョン･フォージの シングルバレルだ

translation.en: Anyway, now y'all gonna have to believe me when I tell y'all...
translation.ja: とにかく悪いのは ジェラルドだぞ

translation.en: - that was Gerald. - And now you're tellin' fibs.
translation.ja: とにかく悪いのは ジェラルドだぞ ウソだろう

translation.en: No, he's not. Girl was there, and the cops were coming
translation.ja: 事実だ 女がいて警察が来て

translation.en: and John happened to be at the motel bar.
translation.ja: ジョンは 偶然バーにいただけだ

translation.en: Gerald asked him to take the fall.
Gerald's got rage issues.
Saying you're the one who beat up a whore is a damn big sacrifice.
translation.ja: 女を暴行した罪を お前がかぶるのか？

translation.en: He's been my business partner for 18 years.
translation.ja: 仕事で18年の付き合いだ

translation.en: Wife's in hospice care.
Ovarian cancer's got her any day now.
I couldn't let Gerald ruin himself in her eyes, so when she passes, he'll confess.
translation.ja: 彼女が亡くなってから ジェラルドに自白させる

translation.en: And until then, I'm hidin' out.
Dadgum, you're a good man, John.
A lot better than I'd have done, that's for damn sure.
translation.ja: 俺には できない行為だ

translation.en: Yeah, we know.
Hey, I found it. There it is.
- Finally. -
Bring that on in. Mmm.
It's looking good.
Sterling!
Holy shit.
Mr. Stevens was just protecting his fuckboy partner.
translation.ja: 彼は共同経営者を守ってる

translation.en: We can't bring him in.
Dude, we need the money.
He didn't do it, it would be wrong. You know this!
You can be very un- fun sometimes!
Get out of here! Oh, peach!
I'm a fruit ninja.
He wasn't there.
Goddamn it, I thought you said you knew what you were doin'.
translation.ja: 仕事を理解してると思ったぞ

translation.en: We thought that you said that you knew what you were doing.
translation.ja: あなたこそ理解してない

translation.en: Yeah, Bowser, so you must of... had some misinformation.
translation.ja: バウザー 残念ながらガセネタだよ

translation.en: Shhhit.
Misinformation.
Oh, that's awesome.
That's...
That's, that's it.
That was amazing.
Mmm. I love you.
I love you.
- Oh. Hey, babe. - Hey.
How was your day?
It was really good. Did you have a good day?
I had such a good day.
- Okay, yeah... See ya. - Do you-- ?
- Okay. - See ya. Uh, I go-- I got golf.
translation.ja: ええ ゴルフに行く

translation.en: You totally just boned.
We made love.
You mean you boned, but slower?
That must have been so intense.
It was kind of awesome.
Oh, my God. When he's--
Hi, Sterling.
- Hi, April. - Hi, Blair.
translation.ja: エイプリル ブレア

translation.en: If my-- If I didn't know my fate at this school rested in her cold little condom- wrapper- grabbing hands,
translation.ja: 彼女が私のゴムの袋を 持ってさえいなければ

translation.en: I'd feel bad for April about her dad.
I hate her dumb bitch face but... yeah.
translation.ja: あの顔は嫌いだけど そうね

translation.en: If his business partner doesn't confess, does he have to go to jail for him?
translation.ja: 相棒が自白しないと 刑務所行き？

translation.en: She'd have one more thing to pray about, that's for sure.
Shit. Shit. Shit.
translation.ja: 〝大変なことを してくれたわね〞 クソ　ヤバい

translation.en: Check your phone. Shit!
translation.ja: 〝大変なことを してくれたわね〞 携帯 見て 携帯 見て 携帯 見て 〝すぐに帰ってきて ママより〞

translation.en: You don't have to sign who it's from.
translation.ja: “ママより”は不要だよ “ママより”は不要だよ 〝差出人 分かるから〞

translation.en: Disappointment is beyond what your father and I feel right now.
translation.ja: あなたたちには 本気で失望したわ

translation.en: - We trusted you girls-- - The Volt is so small.
Oh, you do not interrupt me when I'm talking to you-- !
You do not interrupt your mother.
Took your father's truck without permission. You treated it like trash
translation.ja: 許可なくトラックに 乗ってぶつけて

translation.en: and what's more, you didn't even tell us about crashing it.
You were dishonest and you were irresponsible.
That's right.
We've decided that you two will have to pay for the repairs.
translation.ja: 修理代は２人で払いなさい

translation.en: That's right, you'll have to get jobs.
translation.ja: そう あなたたちは働くのよ

translation.en: And if you can't handle that,
then we will fix the truck with the money we spend sending you to Willingham.
translation.ja: ウィリングハムの学費で トラックを修理する

translation.en: Oh, that's good.
See if y'all can handle public school.
Is that what y'all want? Public school?
Where the principal wears blue jeans,
and the classrooms are just one long bench and a chalkboard on wheels.
translation.ja: 教室にはベンチと 車輪つき黒板しかない

translation.en: - No, ma'am. - Maybe.
Young lady, don't you get smart with me.
translation.ja: 生意気 言わないで

translation.en: Now, are we understood?
Yes, ma'am.
Well, what are you waiting for? Go.
Go!
- I'm just... - Mm.
If we leave right now, we can still make our court.
- - That's good good good good good good.
- That's good. -
- Go away! - Hey.
Or come in.
Hey.
We need work, Bowser.
And I need a big house with a white picket fence
and Tawny Kitaen in the back, cooking me up some pancakes.
translation.ja: パンケーキを焼く美女が要る

translation.en: - That's what I need. - We're serious.
translation.ja: パンケーキを焼く美女が要る 本気よ

translation.en: - Yeah. - Oh, I can tell.
Well, I gave you a chance
and you didn't catch the skip,
so it doesn't sound promising to me.
You can use us. We have a lot of power in the community.
translation.ja: 私たちは顔が利くから 使えるわよ

translation.en: Like, the rich people community.
Yeah, okay, then. Find me John Stevens.
translation.ja: それなら スティーヴンスを捜せ

translation.en: You know, solicitation of a prostitute and battery,
translation.ja: 罪状は売春教唆に暴行なの？

translation.en: that just doesn't sound like John Stevens. Are you sure that the charges are right?
translation.ja: スティーヴンスらしくないわ

translation.en: I would hate to put him away if he didn't really do it.
Hold it right there.
A bounty hunter catches a guy and collects the bounty.
translation.ja: 賞金稼ぎは男を捕らえ 賞金を手にする

translation.en: - Whether he did it-- - Or she...
translation.ja: 賞金稼ぎは男を捕らえ 賞金を手にする または女…

translation.en: Whether he or she did it is no concern of mine.
translation.ja: 男か女が罪を 犯したかどうかは関係ない

translation.en: And if you're real bounty hunters,
it shouldn't be any of yours, either.
- He knows we're not bounty hunters. - Maybe he doesn't,
translation.ja: バレてる 分からないよ　落ち着いて

translation.en: so just chill.
translation.ja: 分からないよ　落ち着いて

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, I can do that.
Just soooo chill.
- Just super chill. - Chill.
So chill.
I know you're not really bounty hunters.
- Aw, shit. - Aw, shoot.
I mean, Come again, dog?
I ran your plates, kid.
You're the teenage daughters of Anderson and Deborah Wesley
translation.ja: ウェズリー家の娘たち

translation.en: of 495 Albemarle Circle.
translation.ja: アルべマール･サークル 495番地

translation.en: Before that you were at 716 Margaret Mitchell.
translation.ja: 前はマーガレット･ ミッチェル716番地

translation.en: By the way, your mama has six unpaid parking tickets.
translation.ja: ママは駐車違反切符 ６枚未払い

translation.en: You post on TikTok 4.2 times a week.
translation.ja: お前は週に4.2回 TikTokに投稿

translation.en: - Should I go on? - TikTok is an art.
How do you know all of that?
Because I'm good at my job,
which is why I was going to let you get away with this until you deliver me John Stevens.
translation.ja: スティーヴンスを届けるなら ウソでも許した

translation.en: He's a big payday, but obviously that's beyond your scope.
translation.ja: 奴は大金になるが お前たちには無理だ

translation.en: But you said yourself we're good at this stuff.
translation.ja: 私たちは有能だと言ったわ

translation.en: Did I really say that?
- Yes. - I don't--
Okay, but it just doesn't make sense for me, girls.
translation.ja: だが 俺にとっては 納得がいかない

translation.en: It'd be like I was babysitting.
And who wants to see me with a baby?
Do you understand? Hell, come on.
Feel free to come by here any time to say hi. Because y'all crack me up.
translation.ja: 笑わせてくれるから いつでも遊びにこい

translation.en: Don't arrest John Stevens. We have inside information. - He's innocent. - Yeah.
translation.ja: でも内部情報によると 彼は無実よ

translation.en: Inside information, hm?
All right, let's see.
Take a look at that.
Security footage from the night of the arrest.
Oh, my gosh, it's totally him.
This is bonkerballs.
Mr. Stevens did it, that little lying piece of shit.
translation.ja: スティーブンスは ウソつき野郎で

translation.en: - He beat up that poor woman. - We should have known.
translation.ja: 女性に暴行した そうよ

translation.en: He just happened to be at the bar? Motels don't have bars.
translation.ja: モーテルにバーはないわ

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
God, you're so smart. It's kind of annoying.
Okay, we need to find him.
Hey, text Miles and see if he's at The Men's Parlour.
Good idea.
He said he can't tell me.
- Tell him you'll go on a date with him. -
He's not there.
Please!
There's no way he's hiding out at home.
How the hell are we gonna find out where he went?
I might have an idea.
You might have an idea or actually have an idea.
No, I have an idea. Let me have my cool, ominous moment.
Okay, sorry.
It's just not cool.
Hey, April, we need to talk to you.
translation.ja: エイプリル 話がある

translation.en: The pressures of Fellowship too much already?
I wish I could help.
Oh, bless your heart.
Uh, no, we met with your daddy this week,
translation.ja: 今週 あなたのパパに

translation.en: and he so graciously offered to sponsor our field trip to the soup kitchen.
translation.ja: 社会見学の出資を 約束してもらったの

translation.en: What a sweet man.
Yeah, the problem is that funding is due tomorrow
translation.ja: 資金提供が明日までで

translation.en: and we can't seem to find him. Do you know where he is?
You met with him earlier this week?
Yeah, Monday. Lovely office.
Gorgeous interior design.
That's funny, because he took his helicopter to Hilton Head
translation.ja: 父はヘリでヒルトンヘッドへ

translation.en: for a golf retreat ten days ago.
- Ooh. - Okay... what?
I'll explain later.
Oh. Sorry, did I say this past Monday? I meant the Monday before that. I'm--
translation.ja: 先週の月曜日だったわ

translation.en: - It's been a long day... - Yeah.
...and yeah, my brain's like melted into a puddle, and, yeah.
translation.ja: 脳みそが溶けたみたい

translation.en: I don't know what you little tramps think you're up to,
translation.ja: あなたたちの魂胆は知らない

translation.en: but I know you're lying.
You do not want to mess with me, honey.
translation.ja: 関わらないで ハニー

translation.en: Just need the money to continue to spread Christ's love.
translation.ja: キリストの愛を広めるには お金がかかるの

translation.en: - No need to get worked up about it. - Stay away from my family.
translation.ja: キリストの愛を広めるには お金がかかるの 家族に近寄らないで

translation.en: Have a blessed night.
Oh, you too, sweetie.
Read the room, Hannah B. For the love of God, read the room.
translation.ja: 空気を読め　ハンナ･Ｂ

translation.en: Hey, Sterl?
I wonder what Ellen would say if she knew
translation.ja: エレンは何て言うかしら？

translation.en: that while I was home making care packages for homeless teens,
translation.ja: 私がホームレスの子のために 物資を集める間

translation.en: her star Fellowship leader was spreading her legs for Luke Creswell
translation.ja: フェローシップのリーダーが ルークに股を開いてるのよ

translation.en: in the senior lot.
Gosh.
What would the whole school... say?
translation.ja: 皆 どう思うかしら？

translation.en: Hoarder.
It was fun while it lasted, Sterl, huh?
Our little life of badassery?
Just would have been nice if it ended after we got the money to pay back Mom and Dad.
translation.ja: 親に返すお金を得て 終わりにしたかった

translation.en: Maybe we can get jobs at that other Yogurtopia on Peachtree.
translation.ja: 別のヨーグルトピアに 応募して

translation.en: Might not suck so hard if we get the same shift.
Hashtag April helps sick kids through Christ.
translation.ja: ＃エイプリル 病気の子を救う

translation.en: What?
That's the hashtag of April's discipleship weekend. Where she took that stupid helicopter to her lake house.
translation.ja: 週末 エイプリルは ヘリコプターで湖畔にいたわ

translation.en: Oh, shit. Yeah.
I bet he is hiding out there.
But how do we find the address?
Well, if April geo- tagged the photos, then--
translation.ja: 位置情報で調べられるよ

translation.en: Except she blocked me.
And her dad's account is private.
translation.ja: お父さんのアカウントは 非公開よ

translation.en: Unless...
Take one of me like this.
Sterling take-- Sterling.
Ster-- Sterling! What are you doing?
Fake account, sexy profile pics,
translation.ja: セクシー画像で裏アカ作って

translation.en: send a follow request and...
And now we wait.
Yeah.
Okay.
